title: anbAra unnai nAn
sahitya:
anbAra unnai nAn alankAram sheidE en ahak-kaNNArk-kANEnO hari mAdhavA


P:  anbAra unnai nAn alankAram sheidE en ahak-kaNNArk-kANEnO hari mAdhavA
A:  paNbAna manadilun para vaDivai nATTiyE bhakti paravashamAgip-pAmAlai shUTTiyE
Andhak-karaNangaLai aNimaNIyAkki Ayira nAmattAl arccanai sEvittu
bandha dondamillA cintaiyai nivEdittu pAhi rAdhA ramaNA pAhi suguNA enrE
